name: "Here's Some Extra Cheer!" Kokoro Tsurumaki
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Music》 character, this card gets +3000 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavor_text: There's no such thing as fun when you're all alone!

name: "On the Path to Dreams" Chisato Shirasagi
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 If your characters on stage have 4 or more colors in total, this card gets +1500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] At the beginning of your encore step, if "An Idol that Inspires" is in your climax area, this card is on your center stage, and your opponent does not have any characters on his or her center stage, or all characters on your opponent's center stage are 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, Trigger FEVER.
【REPLAY】Trigger FEVER Choose up to 1 of your characters, 【REST】 it, and deal 3 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Chisato: "Thank you... Aya-chan…"

name: "This Is Where I Belong" Misaki Okusawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of ""Keep Running Until the End" Misaki Okusawa", you may choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if "Glistening Sun" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 6 cards of your deck into your waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. X is equal to the number of trigger icons revealed among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Actually, I'm right here...

name: "For the Smiles!" Hagumi Kitazawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavor_text: We're ready to go~! Michelle, over here!

name: "With Everyone's Help" Kanon Matsubara
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your encore step, if "A Forced Dance" is in your climax area, this card is on your center stage, and your opponent does not have any characters on his or her center stage, or all characters on your opponent's center stage are 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, Trigger FEVER.
【REPLAY】 Trigger FEVER Choose up to 2 《Music》 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text: Ohh~, yelling like this is so embarrassing...

name: "I Am Me" Kaoru Seta
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room.

【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Whether or not it's a me I desire to be is irrelevant. If it's what others want, if it makes someone else happy, then it's a me I should love, and it's one I can be proud of.

name: "What an Idol Is" Maya Yamato
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 If your characters on stage have 4 or more colors in total, this card gets +1500 power.

【ACT】【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Serious Survivor" is in your climax area, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I may not know what it is now, but one day...

name: "Happy Adventure" Kokoro Tsurumaki
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】[(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 ""Keep Running Until the End" Misaki Okusawa" or "Glistening Sun" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text: When you go on an adventure, you realize just how many wonderful things there are in this world! Things you didn't even know about!

name: "I'm a Human, You Know." Hagumi Kitazawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a card with in its trigger icon, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: As long as you do your very best, you end up smiling even if you lose.

name: "Heave, Ho? Heave, Ho!" Aya Maruyama
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Pastel * Palettes》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I'm going to cheer everyone on so hard! Yeah!

name: "Can You Comprehend?" Kaoru Seta
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that character is a 《Music》 character, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: Can you comprehend it, Misaki? This kind of fleeting...?

name: "To Become More Admired" Eve Wakamiya
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Music》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.

name: "Keep Running Until the End" Misaki Okusawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Poppin'Party》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Poppin'Party》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: Uhm, okay. Which one should we watch?

name: "Hina's Request" Hina Hikawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 If this card has a marker underneath it, this card gets the color green.
【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Music》 characters get +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 ""The Modest Idol" Maya Yamato" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text: Maybe I've had a dream or a goal or whatever all along♪

name: "Enthusiastic Huddle" Kasumi Toyama
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Poppin'Party》 characters get +1500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Poppin'Party》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Yeah~, that performance was non-stop excitement, and everyone was so into it!

name: "Aya Maruyama, The Idol!" Aya Maruyama
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 6 or more climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, and this card's battle opponent is level 3 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: ... Ah! That's it! "A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!"

name: "CiRCLE Storage Expedition" Saya Yamabuki
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Music》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: I'd even give you a run for your money!

name: "Self-Taught Survival" Maya Yamato
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When "Serious Survivor" is placed in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 ""What an Idol Is" Maya Yamato" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: I got a better sense of what exactly I can do for Pastel＊Palettes...

name: "I'm Me" Hina Hikawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "The One and Only Me" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I love everyone in Pastel＊Palettes too~, so that makes me really happy!

name: "In a Place as Big as This...?!" Rimi Ushigome
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power.
【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.

name: "Important Moment" Saya Yamabuki
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters) Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I was just thinking... I'm happy to have joined a band with friends who can really go nuts and enjoy themselves.

name: "Important Opportunity" Hina Hikawa
expansion: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Vol.2
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to 2 of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Bond/""If I Could Be Myself..." Chisato Shirasagi" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""If I Could Be Myself..." Chisato Shirasagi" from your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: In that case, I guess I'll stick around until that happens. I've got a feeling it's gonna be interesting!
